# NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier.everySubelement

**Case**

Every element that meets the specifier test.

## Declaration

```swift
case everySubelement
```

## Constants

- **NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier.indexSubelement**: An element at a given index that meets the specifier test.
- **NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier.middleSubelement**: The middle element that meets the specifier test.
- **NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier.randomSubelement**: Any element that meets the specifier test.
- **NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier.noSubelement**: No sub-element met the specifier test. Valid only for specifying the end sub-element.; that is, there is no end, so consider all elements.
